title: malai aruvi pOla
sahitya:
malai aruvi pOlak-kalai aruvi pozhindAn mA kavi mannam kambanE ulagu pOTra


anupallavi

  shilai peru vIranAm sItArAman kathaiyai tigazhum amarAnanda cittiramAga sheidE


caraNam    shollamudum azhagu sokkum poruLamudum suvaikka manam inikkum navarasat-tEnamudum
nalla naDaiyuDanE vellum tamizh isaiyum nATTi enakku vazhi kATTiya gurumaNi
